# Single-Page CV

Create a single-page HTML CV to showcase your career history

![Demo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/71359268/400039664-5148954f-337b-4396-85ba-54eebdeb3e0f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..L34ldvpWKcIkVHmErkR3L1eWRsjDkzpZp6LFyMS57vI)

## Requirements for this project:

- Semantic HTML: Use appropriate HTML tags to structure your CV.
- SEO Meta Tags: Include essential meta tags for SEO.
- Open Graph (OG) Tags: Add OG tags for better social media sharing.
- Favicon: Add a favicon for your CV page.

The structure of your CV should be easily understandable and ready for styling in a future project.

## Installation

To view Single-Page CV, first, clone the repository. After that, you can open the index.html file in the browser of choice.

## Contributions

If you would like to contribute to task-cli, please fork the repository, create a branch for your feature or bug fix, and then submit a pull request.

## Project URL: https://roadmap.sh/projects/single-page-cv
